questions.question_text: Identify the missing word in the following sentence. A member of the Project Board is responsible for [ ? ] assurance.

discussion.content: The project board members each have a specific area of focus for project assurance, namely business assurance for the executive, user assurance for the senior user(s) and supplier assurance for the senior supplier(s). So the correct answer is C - supplier

Selected Answer: B
Correct answer is B - Project board is covering: Supplier, user and project assurance. Quality assurance is covered by the business layer / corporade and its indenpendent of the Project management team

Selected Answer: A
Product assurance (D): Product assurance might refer to ensuring that products meet specifications or requirements, but this would usually be handled by product teams or technical experts, not the Project Board. The Project Board oversees the project at a higher level, ensuring overall quality rather than focusing on individual product assurance.



In contrast, quality assurance is a direct responsibility of the Project Board in ensuring that the project's outputs (products, services, or results) meet the required standards and expectations. This is why quality is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: B
Project assurance function is when each board members has their own responsibilities reflecting their specific interests:
 Business assurance.
 User assurance.
 Supplier assurance.
